header.title: About Me
header.description: Iâ€™m a software developer from Switzerland, focused on web development and web design. I bring a wide range of software development skills with strong expertise in React and TypeScript. Currently, I work at the company Synprovis, helping develop the quality management tool Improve 2.

items.title: Creative Foundations
items.description: I began my journey at Invers art school, where I learned the fundamentals of design. During this time, I discovered web development and programming, which sparked my passion for building digital solutions.

items.title: First Steps as a Developer
items.description: I decided to shift my career path towards software development and started working on my first small projects, gaining hands-on experience and deepening my skills.

items.title: Coding Quality
items.description: Two years after deciding to pursue a coding career, I started my first full-time role as a software developer at the company Synprovis. There, I contribute to the development of quality management software and help build Improve 2.

end.title: Ready to Collaborate?
end.description: Let's work together to bring your ideas to life.
